title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Legacy Modernization with Slalom & AWS (MAM216)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 与 Slalom 和 AWS 加速传统系统现代化 (MAM216)
abstract: Start engineering the future. During this lightning talk, learn how Slalom combines AWS-native AI tooling like Amazon Q and AWS Transform, modern delivery, and human-centered change to turn legacy from a liability into a launchpad. Hear real-life examples and learnings from industries ranging from financial services to retail and consumer goods. Whether you're dealing with aging applications, growing mainframe risk, or fragmented data platforms, modernizing with Slalom and AWS can bring clarity, security, and speed—empowering you to accelerate value delivery, boost business agility, and unlock new revenue-driving capabilities. This presentation is brought to you by Slalom, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 开始构建未来。在这场闪电演讲中，了解 Slalom 如何结合 AWS 原生 AI 工具（如 Amazon Q 和 AWS Transform）、现代化交付方法以及以人为本的变革管理，将传统系统从负担转变为发展跳板。聆听来自金融服务、零售和消费品等行业的真实案例和经验教训。无论您面对的是老化的应用程序、不断增长的大型机风险，还是碎片化的数据平台，通过 Slalom 和 AWS 进行现代化改造都能带来清晰度、安全性和速度——助力您加速价值交付、提升业务敏捷性并释放新的创收能力。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 Slalom 呈现。
